QuestData.Title: Sinking From Within
QuestData.Description: The attack on Booty Bay is looming. You'll have to return to Booty Bay quickly and inform the Baron.$b$bFirst, however, it might be a good idea to sabotage some of the pirates' supplies while you're still in their favor. The pirates keep most of their supplies belowdecks, spread out across the entire fleet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sabotage the Barrel of Grog, the Barrel of Gunpowder, and the Crate of Cannonballs.
QuestData.CompletionText: The attack on Booty Bay draws nearer!
QuestData.RewardText: You've set the pirates back several days' work. Hopefully this will delay their attack.
